page.title: 13CHILDRENS GAMES
page.content: Many of us like to play outside in our spare time.We build{camps}and{tree {houses}using old bales ,planks,tyres, stones,plastic and anything we can find.We put up a sign saying"Private." Sometimes we play{tracks}on paths. We like{football ,rollerball,cricket, {Piggy}in the{middle}and racing about on bikes.{Spider and Flies}is a tuggy game,{Block 123}is chasing and hiding. In{winter}we love playing snowball fights,building igloos and tunnels with our hands. At school we play a singing dance called{"All Aboard." Everyone joins in,both boys and girls. { British Bulldog}is rough,if you don't cross the line you are caught.{Cowboys and{Indians}is good.We chase each other then hide and fight pretending to die.With our torches we play{Jack {Shine}in the dark.Your name is shouted out if the light shines on you.
